annotations.paragraph: There are many ways to evaluate a country’s status and power in the world. But how a nation is viewed among citizens of its peers can offer an insightful gauge of its global standing and significance in areas like economic influence, military might and quality of life.
annotations.reason: This paragraph provides context on the importance of global perception in evaluating countries.

annotations.paragraph: The 2024 Best Countries rankings from U.S. News reflect perceptions of 89 countries based on a survey of close to 17,000 global citizens, with respondents connecting nations to dozens of attributes within 10 subrankings such as heritage, adventure, cultural influence, power and social purpose. Scores resulting from those associations led to the overall ranking of the world’s best countries, along with dozens of other unique lists.
annotations.reason: This paragraph explains the methodology behind the rankings, which is directly relevant to the article's premise.
